definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

pair of annual sacrificial ceremonies held by the emperor in ancient times: one in the southern suburbs of the capital (bringing offerings to Heaven) and another in the northern suburbs (with offerings to Earth)
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
my late father/my ancestors/the late emperor
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
to offer sacrifices to the gods or ancestors
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
central of the five Zhou dynasty royal academies
